reviewText: Not clear instruction on certain moves; too much talking; no side views; not enough repetition!!! Girls are always hesitating because the narrator starts off counting really slow.  Further, girls are facing you, not turned around so you can mirror them and learn. It starts off with instructions on how to hold poms and how to point my toes....good riddens, I think if I'm doing choreography we're past that. It's alright, but I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
